comment.author: 99498651@N06
comment._content: coud most possibly the modern Central.

comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: Definitely Central. The tower near the centre is St John's Cathedral. To the right is French Foreign Mission building, today's Court of Final Appeal. Far right is Murray Barrack, present day Queensway. The buildings on the far left are the buildings behind Botanical Gardens, seen in photo CO 1069-444-07
